frontmatter.title: Revisiting the First PaperFace
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of my wife revisited after two years of drawing with Paper.

markdownRemark.html:
Well it’s been exactly two years since I started the PaperFaces Project. Thought it would be interesting to draw my wife again to see how much my skills had improved over the course of the project.

It wasn’t the most difficult photograph to recreate in Paper, seeing how the face is obscured and all that. But you can certainly see a change in technique and accuracy between the two.

Tools used:

  • Pencil by FiftyThree
  • Paper for iOS
